name: Blutmond - platformer prototype
description:
A working first build for a platformer game. We focused on trying to get slopes of any angle to work with the platforming mechanics, and while there is still much work to be done, the basic functionality is now done.

The downloadable as presented only has a test room in which to try out the platforming. We would appreciate it very much if you gave it a try, tested the mechanics, and left us some feedback on what we could improve!
